website_summaries.verdict: Users like the price and deep-cleaning effects, and you can use the cleanser of your choice.
pros: Comes with three heads for versatile facial treatment
Users with acne and problem skin report good results, as it allows treatment cleaners to penetrate the skin more deeply
cons: Some users report vague instructions along with the brush

customer_reviews.title: Better than Clarisonic!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the True Glow by Conair a few weeks now and my skin looks better already. It has a glow, looks fresher and my pores are visibly cleaner. I used Clarisonic for 4 years and got tired of spending over $100 for a product that dies every 2 years. I wasn't going to spend another $100 for an unreliable product so I decided to try Conair. The Conair was cheaper, works better, and worth the money. Hopefully it last longer than Clarisonic.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: lame
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I had a cheaper, battery-powered Conair that spun instead of just vibrating. I was hoping the brushes from my old one would work on this one, but planned obsolescence strikes again. This one is bigger and the charge doesn't last very long. I couldn't find the cheaper one on Amazon, but found it at the grocery store and will be buying that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wine

customer_reviews.title: Get a Clairsonic - this one spits
customer_reviews.text: If you like cleaning your mirror every day, great. This unit spits everywhere. I got a refund. Save your money and get the real deal, a Clairsonic.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Giant vibrating toothbrush for your face
customer_reviews.text: This does not rotate like the old Conair face scrubber, it simply vibrates like a Sonicare toothbrush. Skin feels good but I mow have to make a scrubbing motion to get a result.
customer_reviews.author: Cango

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received wrong model. Upon charging it would not stop beeping and the red light flashing. Very disappointed. Thought I would give it a try since Clarisonic stop making there brand.
customer_reviews.author: April Roffers

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for an older unit that failed. Disappointed that came with only a small brush and not also with a larger brush like the one replaced.
customer_reviews.author: howard mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it sends vibrations to cleanse your face. It is gentle yet effective. Your face feels very clean when used with a facial soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will return it for not working
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in operable. It would not charge It’s total junk Do not buy this product unless you enjoy returning things.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sleiman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool for cleaning my face. It’s gentle enough to use daily. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Runner Rookie

customer_reviews.title: does not spin 👎🏾
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new spin brush but this one only vibrates. Ill update after a few uses to see if there's a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Does the facial cleaner have the desired brushes to rejuvenate and clean skin.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t give me the results I expected. Brushes or mechanism doesn’t propel to give skin a rejuvenated look.
customer_reviews.author: Ma Ma

customer_reviews.title: Charger contacts corrode with any water
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another one of these (same brand/model) less than a year ago and it will no longer charge without balancing a weight on top. The cause stems from water getting on the contacts and not draining off adequately, despite the hole in the bottom for that purpose. Contact pins are now green from corrosion. When you use a facial scrubber there is apt to be water on it when you set it back in the charger. This needs to have an inductive charger like those you find on electric toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeyCat

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in Conair, I had high hopes. Brushes are not as soft as expected. I had purchased one first via costco and it only worked for few uses and stopped charging, conair customers service was not helpful, I dint want to waste my brushes so I purchased this one, the good part my old brushes fit this one however it gave me bad breakout after using for few days.... not for sensitive skin.. will update my review after a month if this works for my husband and doesn't break like my old one. Update after 3 months - it had the same issue as my previous one, doesn't charge and keeps beeping. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: really helped clear up acne
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this so I thought I would give it a try. I was pessimistic at first as it didn't seem like the vibration would do much for my skin...but oh my heck...if I have a breakout and use this it'll be gone in days which my skin normally takes weeks to heal. I am sold. This stays charged for a very long time and is high quality. Comes with an extra head/brush. I highly recommend for people looking to heal acne fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved my old one so much I bought a new one
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this for six years, used it daily and it finally just died. I've traveled all over the world with the old one so I was sad when it wouldn't hold a charge anymore. this one seems to hold a charge longer, the ild heads I had bought fit on it too. I am incredibly excited to see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: TolaNaomi

customer_reviews.title: The Older TruGlo by Conair Sonic Facial Version Was Better
customer_reviews.text: The one I bought a few years ago finally wore out - used it every day. This new version is good but the sonic/brush action is not as intense, even on High. The brushes are almost too soft for me. I chose the Conair again because my first one was great quality, ease of use, etc. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan P.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Facial Brush
customer_reviews.text: This actually replaced an identical one that I had for years, until the battery just wouldn't charge anymore. I love using this facial brush, & my face feels cleaner after use. It can be used in the shower, & since the brush can get under water, it's very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Good value, Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Good value and it works great. Like the 2 speeds.
customer_reviews.author: AllieB

customer_reviews.title: Shower friendly
customer_reviews.text: Threw this in my shower but it’s a bit rough with most facial cleansers. I also found it difficult to tackle my T-Zone. Would definitely recommend wearing sunscreen (if used in the morning) or using a moisturizer (if using before bedtime), because it does serious exfoliation. It comes with two replacement brush heads, which I found confusing. I thought at first the brush heads were different from each other and then felt really stupid when I realized they weren’t. It’s pretty awkward though because the extra brush heads are loose, unless I want to get a special case or something for them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Too much for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately i tried this just the other day and ended up with irritation, redness, inflammation, and dryness. I used my regular cleanser so I know it's not that. I havent used any new products or endured anything damaging to my skin to cause these symptoms. I think the brushes is just to hard or stiff for my sensitive skin. I didnt press all that hard but enough to feel like I was getting a bit of exfoliation. I dont think I'll be using this again. It was nice to have something easy to hold and use to clean my face but I'll be going back to my silicone pad that is gentle but leaves my face feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush for the price
customer_reviews.text: First off, this brush set is currently sold for $19, so you have to keep that in mind and set your expectations accordingly. It's a pretty good brush for that price! It's soft, has adjustable speeds, and cleans well. Sometimes your skin just needs a good deep clean and exfoliation, and this brush will get you there. It's probably not great for sensitive skin, or acne. I would use this 2-3x per week on normal, combo, or dry skin. The downside to me is that I didn't see replacement heads for sale. So this is basically good for about 6 months, give or take depending on how often you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: True Glow by Conair Battery Operated Facial Cleansing Brush
customer_reviews.text: This True Glow by Conair Battery Operated Facial Cleansing Brush is just ok. It is a basic, no frills cleaning brush that runs on 2 AAA batteries. It also comes with 2 additional brush heads- they are all the same bristle firmness. The cleansing is a little much for sensitive skin so be mindful of that. It does leave skin feeling clean and soft. It is recommended to use this brush wet with your desired cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Super Nintendo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is just as expected. Its not too harsh. The brushes are just the right amount of exfoliating. I like that it comes with extra brush heads.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA A DONOHUE

product_meta.title: True Glow by Conair Battery Operated Sonic Facial Cleansing Brush, White
product_meta.description: The True Glow Battery-Operated Facial Cleansing Brush is the perfect cleansing companion for smooth, glowing skin. It gently removes dirt, oil and makeup, and includes three brush attachments to clean, exfoliate, moisturize and massage. With 2 speeds, this cleansing brush clears blackheads and prevents acne and is suitable for all skin types. Use it with your favorite cleanser for amazing results!
feature_bullets: Battery Operated Facial Brush: Our 2 speed facial cleansing brush features a 360° rotating brush head, comes with 3 attachment brushes and is perfect for cleansing, exfoliating, moisturizing, and massaging skin
Best Face Forward: Gently remove dirt, oil, and make up from pores, while whisking away dead skin cells with Conair True Glow Sonic Facial Cleansing brushes. Reveal healthy-looking skin in 60 seconds
Total At Home Spa Experience: From sonic cleansing brushes and facial steamers to paraffin treatments, light therapy devices and more, Conair True Glow skin care tools help make every day a spa day

At Home Skincare Essentials for Glowing Skin: Conair makes at-home skincare easy! Gently and thoroughly remove dirt, oil, and makeup. Cleanse, exfoliate, and moisturize for a complete home spa experience
